parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> DLC

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns total time the assets of the given DLC have been used. See [[:Category:Arma 3 DLCs & Expansions|Arma 3 DLCs & Expansions]] for a list of DLCs and ids.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getDLCUsageTime]] appId

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> appId: [[Number]] - DLC's Steam appId

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - DLC assets usage time in seconds

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _kartsUsage = [[getDLCUsageTime]] 288520;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDLCs]], [[getObjectDLC]], [[getPersonUsedDLCs]], [[getMissionDLCs]], [[getDLCAssetsUsageByName]], [[getDLCAssetsUsage]], [[getAssetDLCInfo]]
</value></part></template></root>
